ValidationRule.description: This Validation check if only a manager are able to approve client
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($User.BypassVR__c ) &&( ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(NominationStatus__c) ) && ( ISPICKVAL(NominationStatus__c, 'Approved') || ISPICKVAL(NominationStatus__c, 'Refused') ) && $Profile.Name <> "ICON_SA Manager" && $Profile.Name <> "ICON_SAManager_EVERYWHERE" && $Profile.Name <> "ICON_Corporate" && $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && $Profile.Name <> "System Admin_Corporate" && $Profile.Name <> "LV_Club"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only manager can approve or reject client when client Not registered
